developed.from sentence: We have developed our joint model by using Python with the TensorFlow machine learning library .

Training.from sentence: Training is performed using the Adam optimizer ( Kingma & Ba , 2015 ) with a learning rate of 10 ?3 .

for.from sentence: The hidden dimension for the characterbased LSTMs is 25 ( for each direction ) .

fix.from sentence: We fix the size of the LSTM to d = 64 and the layer width of the neural network to l = 64 ( both for the entity and the relation scoring layers ) .

use.from sentence: We use dropout to regularize our network .

employ.from sentence: We employ the technique of early stopping based on the validation set .

obtain.from sentence: In all the datasets examined in this study , we obtain the best hyperparameters after 60 to 200 epochs depending on the size of the dataset .
